name: Bowser x Peach: Superstar Sexting
description: Bowser vs Peach: Superstar Sexting. A game where you play as Mario in an effort to rescue Peach from Bowser. During your journey, you will receive snapchat sexts of the Princess and Bowser slowly progressing through a "romantic" night. If you rescue her in time, her virginity is all yours. But if you're too slow, you have to watch as Bowser strips away her innocence.​
